page.title: 03GREEN HAMMERTON TRAFFIC
page.content: The road through our village is very busy it is called A 59 it goes from York to Harrogate.Heavy vehicles go to the Al from the A59. It is so busy we need a crossing lady. She is called Mrs. Phillips.In l986 we are getting a bypass. Every day for a week we went out at 9.00am to 9.15am,11.00am to 11.15am and 3.00pm to 3.15pm.At the 9.00 count 3 quarters of the count was cars and nearly 1 quarter was HGVs and lorries.The 11.00 count again was mostly cars with quite a few HGVs and lorries and a few vans.The 3.00pm count had a lot of cars and nearly 1 quarter of HGVs and lorries.We only saw one bicycle in one of the days.There were not many buses and hardly any motorbikes.
